name: My chicken world
description:
《My chicken world》 is a first-person shooter game, in which player can choose their weapons freely when they are born. Then you will fly to the battlefield by air, find supplies alive, and wipe out all the enemies.
WASD movement;
Mouse control perspective;
Left mouse button attack;
Right mouse button aiming;
X view backpack;
The ESC menu.
M open or close the map;
F pick up the weapon;
R loading;
